description: Midlayer or standalone, city or mountain town, outdoors or in – this is a highly versatile fleece. The lighter weight Alpenex™ fleece delivers thermal performance that lets you wear this as a warming layer under a shell or on its own as sweater. The fabric’s double knit heathered face has the look of wool, and the deep front zip adds ventilation and makes pulling it on and off easy. Laminated details and the trim fit give a streamlined aesthetic, and articulated patterning frees you to move.
name: Arcteryx Covert LT 1/2 Zip - Mens
